Make a search URL for OnePetro

Source: R/url.R
make_search_url.Rd

Create a URL that works in OnePetro website

make_search_url(query = NULL, start = NULL, from_year = NULL,
  peer_reviewed = NULL, published_between = NULL, rows = NULL,
  to_year = NULL, dc_type = NULL, how = "any")

Arguments

query

char any words that will be searched
start

int optional to set the starting paper
from_year

int optional to indicate starting year
peer_reviewed

logical optional, TRUE or FALSE
published_between

logical automatic if from_year or to_year are on
rows

int optional. number of papers to retrieve. max=1000
to_year

int optional to indicate end year
dc_type

char optional to indicate if journal, conference paper
how

char default="any". "all" will match exact words

Examples

# Example 1
url_1 <- make_search_url(query = "flowing gradient survey", how = "all")
onepetro_page_to_dataframe(url_1)
#> # A tibble: 10 x 6
#>    book_title              paper_id   dc_type  authors               year source
#>    <fct>                   <fct>      <fct>    <chr>                <int> <fct> 
#>  1 Detection and Removal ~ OTC-25003~ confere~ Mohamed, A.S., Dele~  2014 OTC   
#>  2 Samarang Downhole Inte~ SPE-18068~ confere~ Setiawan, Toto, PET~  2016 SPE   
#>  3 Adding Value to Gas Li~ SPE-13354~ confere~ Friedli, John David~  2010 SPE   
#>  4 Proper Selection of Mu~ SPE-17580~ confere~ Abd El Moniem, Moha~  2015 SPE   
#>  5 CO2 Tracer for Gaslift~ SPE-18926~ confere~ Sidek, Sulaiman, PE~  2017 SPE   
#>  6 Estimating Reservoir P~ URTEC-193~ confere~ Jones, R. Steven Jr~  2014 URTEC 
#>  7 CO2 Tracer Application~ SPE-19190~ confere~ Abu Bakar, Azfar Is~  2018 SPE   
#>  8 Development of an Inte~ SPE-10108~ confere~ Nadar, Manickavasak~  2006 SPE   
#>  9 Nonstatic Pressure His~ SPE-10356~ journal~ Rodgers, J.S., Otis~  1983 SPE   
#> 10 Influence of Downhole ~ SPE-14329~ confere~ Bouhanna, Mahfoud, ~  2011 SPE   
# Example 2
url_2 <- make_search_url(query = "static  gradient survey", how = "all")
onepetro_page_to_dataframe(url_2)
#> # A tibble: 10 x 6
#>    book_title              paper_id   dc_type  authors               year source
#>    <fct>                   <fct>      <fct>    <chr>                <int> <fct> 
#>  1 Field Trial of an Acou~ SPE-10513~ confere~ Fyfe, David G., Met~  2007 SPE   
#>  2 Multilayer Flowmeter T~ SPE-20897~ journal~ Vogelij, Harry N.J.~  1993 SPE   
#>  3 Insert String Techniqu~ SPE-93848~ confere~ Sulai, Abdul Thani,~  2005 SPE   
#>  4 Multirate Welltest Des~ SPE-18913~ confere~ Ndukwe, Reginald, T~  2017 SPE   
#>  5 Slimhole Drilling With~ SPE-95896~ confere~ Montagna, James N.,~  2005 SPE   
#>  6 Aquifer Influx Modelli~ PETSOC-20~ confere~ Lies, H.K., HyPex C~  2000 PETSOC
#>  7 Production Monitoring ~ SPE-13796~ confere~ Tournier, Emmanuel,~  2010 SPE

#> 10 An Investigation on Fa~ OTC-24780~ confere~ W Razak, Wan Nurul ~  2014 OTC   
# Example 3
url_3 <- make_search_url(query = "downhole flowrate measurement",
      how = "all", from_year = 1982, to_year = 2017)
onepetro_page_to_dataframe(url_3)
#> # A tibble: 7 x 6
#>   book_title               paper_id  dc_type   authors               year source
#>   <fct>                    <fct>     <fct>     <chr>                <int> <fct> 
#> 1 Permanent Real-Time Dow~ SPE-1071~ conferen~ Zakharov, Mikhail, ~  2007 SPE   
#> 2 Study on the Applicatio~ SPE-1869~ conferen~ Jia, Deli, Research~  2017 SPE   
#> 3 Pressure Transient Anal~ SPE-1830~ conferen~ Kuchuk, F. J., Schl~  1988 SPE   
#> 4 Derivative of Pressure:~ SPE-1586~ conferen~ Proano, E.A., Flope~  1986 SPE   
#> 5 Well Test Interpretatio~ SPE-1460~ conferen~ Kabir, C.S., Schlum~  1986 SPE   
#> 6 Achievements of Smart W~ SPE-1071~ conferen~ Raw, Ian, Schlumber~  2007 SPE
